title: Custom Trait Creation
description: Learn to design and create custom traits for NFT collections. Master the art of trait design that enhances rarity, aesthetics, and community value.

modules.title: Trait Design Fundamentals
modules.description: Understand the principles of effective trait design

lessons.title: What Makes a Good Trait?
lessons.content:
Traits are the building blocks of NFT collections. They define rarity, aesthetics, and community identity.

**Trait Categories:**
• Background (environment, mood)
• Body (base character)
• Clothing (style, rarity)
• Accessories (items, props)
• Facial features (expression, uniqueness)
• Special effects (glows, animations)

**Design Principles:**
• Consistency across variations
• Clear visual hierarchy
• Scalable design system
• Community appeal
• Technical feasibility

**Rarity Considerations:**
• Common (60-80%)
• Uncommon (15-25%)
• Rare (5-10%)
• Legendary (1-3%)
• Mythic (0.1-0.5%)

lessons.title: Trait Layering & Compatibility
lessons.content:
**Layer Organization:**
• Background (bottom layer)
• Body/base character
• Clothing/outfits
• Accessories/props
• Facial features
• Effects/overlays

**Compatibility Rules:**
• Traits must work together
• Avoid clipping issues
• Maintain visual balance
• Consider color harmony
• Test all combinations

**Technical Requirements:**
• Consistent dimensions
• Transparent backgrounds
• Proper file formats
• Optimized file sizes
• Metadata standards

modules.title: Rarity Strategy
modules.description: Design rarity systems that create value and excitement

lessons.title: Rarity Distribution
lessons.content:
**Rarity Tiers:**
• Common: 60-80% (base traits)
• Uncommon: 15-25% (variations)
• Rare: 5-10% (desirable traits)
• Legendary: 1-3% (highly sought)
• Mythic: 0.1-0.5% (ultra rare)

**Distribution Strategies:**
• Bell curve (most in middle)
• Exponential (fewer rare items)
• Custom curves (project-specific)
• Dynamic rarity (community voting)

**Value Creation:**
• Scarcity drives demand
• Utility enhances value
• Community recognition
• Historical significance
• Future potential

lessons.title: Trait Combinations
lessons.content:
**Synergy Traits:**
• Complementary designs
• Thematic connections
• Visual harmony
• Story elements
• Community references

**Exclusive Combinations:**
• Rare trait + rare trait = ultra rare
• Seasonal combinations
• Event-specific traits
• Community milestone rewards
• Governance participation perks

**Avoiding Conflicts:**
• Clashing color schemes
• Incompatible styles
• Overlapping elements
• Confusing combinations

modules.title: Community Integration
modules.description: Design traits that strengthen community bonds

lessons.title: Community-Driven Traits
lessons.content:
**Community Input:**
• Poll-based trait selection
• Community contests
• Member suggestions
• Event participation rewards
• Governance voting results

**Lore Integration:**
• Story-driven traits
• Character development
• Historical references
• Future prophecies
• Community milestones

**Utility Traits:**
• Governance voting power
• Access to exclusive content
• Event participation
• Community roles
• Future airdrops
